text:
Hello,
I try to create a line item from existing product, from documentation when you create a line item from existing product specifying "hs_object_id" the line item will inherit properties from product like price, When I do the request line item is created but product properties are not inherited the price is always 0.00.

```properties: {
    name: "Some name here",
    quantity: 1,
    hs_object_id: "1234567890"
}```

Hello, I've been experiencing slow responses from the HubSpot API. Sometimes it takes up to 8 seconds to get a response for a simple search or object create HTTP Request. Its not rate limiting as we usually have around 100 requests per day only. Have there been any significant slow downs on the API recently? I have a private app configured which is my .Net service.

hello guys!
How can i use HubSpot scopes?
Hey, is it possible to export a custom report (<http://app.HubSpot.com/reports-list/xxx/yyy|app.HubSpot.com/reports-list/xxx/yyy>) to a CSV using the API?

I could be wrong but I think "the line item will inherit properties" means the line item will have those properties but it will not inherit the "values" - so you could first read the product data and then populate the line item with the values you want to pass in (price, cost, etc.).

Hi every one,

I made an HubSpot public application. And I am trying to connect an AWS Appflow flux to it.
Once connection is created, I am redirected to HubSpot with this error message :
*"Impossible de terminer la connexion*
L'autorisation a échoué car il y a une incohérence entre les domaines dans l'URL d'installation et les domaines configurés de l'application. Veuillez contacter le développeur de l'application."

I correctly configured redirection URL to "<http://eu-central-1.console.aws.amazon.com/appflow/oauth|eu-central-1.console.aws.amazon.com/appflow/oauth>"

I have no clue at this point. Anyone already experienced this ?

Hello, I tried to register new contact with Subscription via Form Api.

Everything is correct, but the subscription registration is not completed:

I am trying to follow docs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/marketing/forms/v3-l><https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/marketing/forms/v3-legacy#submit-data-to-a-form|…>.

 A printout of the submitted data has been attached, contact is stored, but subscription is not.. any thoughts? thank you very much

If I am paginating through records in the search API (lets say companies or contacts) using a datetime column like `lastmodifieddate` or `createdate` is there chance that two times are identical down to the microsecond? I guess what I am asking is that if I use a `GTE` filter on datetime and just paginate with datetimes is there a chance I can get stuck? And are there ways around this if so? I just have never ran into this personally but if its an edge case to watch out for my current ideas will not work
Also is this the place to ask this question? Please and thank you....

Hello!
How many contacts can be created in a single request using the following API endpoint?

• <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/create>

Hey everyone,

Just following up on my previous post regarding the issue with tracking Google and Facebook leads after the recent API shift. We haven't received any feedback yet and would really appreciate your insights or suggestions on how to resolve this. Has anyone else faced similar issues or found a workaround?

Thanks in advance for your help!
